Als een hoofdgerecht had ik de be - Dali, een geweldig 150 g vlees patty met foie en confit ui gekookt precies zoals ik vroeg. Mijn vrienden probeerden de be - Pol, be - Mozart en be - Dolce Vita en ze waren allemaal verbaasd over de kwaliteit van alle ingredi√´nten en de zorgvuldige presentatie en plating. We eindigden de maaltijd met hun zelfgemaakte witte chocolade cheesecake dat de perfecte laatste touch voor een onvergetelijk diner was.

Niemand van ons was veganistisch of vegetarisch, maar ze bieden een mooie selectie van veganistische burgers en veel tuin-tot-tafel opties die het "be Restaurant" echt vriendelijk maken voor mensen met dieetwensen.

De locatie van het "be Restaurant" is perfect, want het ligt op slechts 5 minuten lopen van het centrale treinstation Sants Estaci en het ligt ook vlak naast de halte "Enten a" van de blauwe metrolijn (L 5). We were a group of 6 friends (3 couples) in our 30 s catch -up after the summer holidays.We were greeted at the door by Marc, one of the owners and the heart and soul of the famous "Be Burger" and also the newer "Be Restaurant" .... the atmosphere in the restaurant is really hospitable.They present a selection of great types of beer that they know well, so that you can ask for recommendations in case of doubt.We had some fries to start with and they were to die;Not only because the sauce was really a homemade "brava" sauce, but because the potatoes themselves were prepared to perfection by chef Albert, the other owner.

Like a main course I had the be - dali, a great 150 g meat patty with foie and confit onion cooked exactly as I asked.My friends tried the BE - Pol, BE - Mozart and BE - Dolce Vita and they were all surprised at the quality of all the ingredients and the careful presentation and plotting.We ended the meal with their homemade white chocolate cheesecake that was the perfect last touch for an unforgettable dinner.

None of us was vegan or vegetarian, but they offer a nice selection of vegan burgers and many garden-to-table options that make the "Be Restaurant" really friendly to people with dietary requirements.

The location of the "Be Restaurant" is perfect, because it is just a 5 -minute walk from the central train station Sants Estaci and it is also right next to the "ENTEN A" stop from the Blue Metrol Line (L 5).The neighborhood is relaxed but at the same time centric.This is a great choice if you want to go out after dinner or if you want to stay on the table.
